meanings.definition: A type of plant with spiny leaves and flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful acanthuses.
meanings.sent2: I planted some acanthuses in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns among the acanthuses.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a way that resembled the spiky acanthuses.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a stunning landscape with vibrant acanthuses in the foreground.

meanings.definition: The decorative motif of the leaves of the acanthus plant, often used in architecture.
meanings.sent1: The ancient columns were adorned with intricate acanthuses.
meanings.sent2: The architect incorporated acanthuses into the design of the building.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten chased a butterfly around the acanthuses carved on the pillar.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was embroidered with delicate acanthuses, adding elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast shadows that danced along the acanthuses on the wall.
